text: Massive portion. Buttery eggs. I was very impressed. I had initially thought I was coming to PCS, forgetting that they were closed, however, I was pleasantly surprised with this new offering. Staff was polite and attentive despite previous reviews. Food was plentiful (only finished about half of my meal before I started getting the sweats), and extremely tasty. About as close as I've come to the old Mariani cassoulete. Will return, will recommend.

J'y suis allé il y a quelques jours pour le "petit" déjeuner... C'était une première pour mon amie et moi. Nous avons eu droit à un festin royal, tellement les portions étaient généreuses et esthétiquement présentées. Merci de faire autrement que vos concurrents! Et surtout, ne changez pas votre formule gagnante!

O'Boeuf has amazing burgers but what's even more amazing is that there's an option of having sweet potato fries (which comes with spicy mayonnaise). I usually get the classic burger and can never finish it. To my surprise, even after the burger sat overnight in the fridge, it still tasted really good the day after!

The decor of the restaurant is nice, but the service was lacking. I saw the waiter texting in a corner most of the time. It seemed like he was the only waiter as well.

The food was excellent. I had the wagyu burger and it was amazing!! I also enjoyed the sweet potato fries. It was $30 but I think it was quite worth it.

Went there for brunch with friends and thoroughly enjoyed the menu & service. Moderately priced and good choice on the menu & price.

Looking forward to going there again. Congrats to George and his crew.

First impression of the place is that it has a good energy/vibe with a live DJ on Wednesdays for ladies night and great space for eating with a hipster feel. Although the bar spot is small and really not impressive and the decor itself needs a bit of remodeling. Also did not like the fact that the bathroom is small, unisex and found located beside the bar spot. Good cocktail selection and good drink pricing (definately can't complain for 3$/cocktail on ladies night) but the food was average and a little overpriced for the quality of the ingredients. The service although was excellent. Overall I would come back on ladies night for a meal and drinks for the ambiance of the place.

I went there for breakfast and it was the most horrible thing I have ever eaten. I ordered an Egg Benedict and everything tasted like vinegar. When you go there do not be surprised if you are not able to enjoy your meal because of the vinegar.

Been there twice, very much enjoyed our brunch at this place. The portion is huge, I can't eat anything for the rest of the day!! There's quite a lot of options but my all time favorite is the egg benedict (alwaaays perfectly done) and the waffle on the side. Server was slow a bit when we wanted to pay but overall good. Really easy to find free parking. I would definitely come back again.

Generous portions and always delicious!
Ive been going to this restaurant for a few years now and have yet to be disappointed with the quality of their food. Their breakfast combos are well-priced! 

Pancakes, French toast, waffles, eggs, fruits, meats and sooo much more are always yummy!!!! 

Clean establishment!

They serve and make great MIMOSAS!!!
My favorite accompaniment when having breakfast!

J'y suis retourné pour le départ d'un collègue de travail et je pense que c'est officiellement la dernière fois que j'y vais !

Le serveuse qui met 10 minutes à nous servir 5 bières et qui nous les sert en décalée car elle ne sait pas servir les pintes car ca mousse comparé aux verres ...
La salade césar qui arrive sans les croûtons et avec du gruyère à la place du parmesan ....
Les fruits servis sur la salade césar donc avec du fromage dessus ...
La formule qui comporte le café mais qui apparaît sur l'addition ...

Ca fait trop d'erreur pour ma part, surtout après un premier passage pas du tout convaincant ...

Au revoir ...

Looks like the other reviewers had brunch.  I came for a burger. I had the bison burger. The meat was a little dry.  For the price of the burger I was disappointed as it was just ok.  The fries were pretty good. The waitresses were friendly and easy on the eyes.  I'd consider giving 2 and half stars, but not having any English menus dropped it down a notch.

Excellent! Jai
Mangé le burger  végé c'était excellent! 
Jai aussi goûté le sangria champagne! Ça goûte beaucoup les framboises. Ambiance agréable ! Très bon service!
Little expensive but great portions and flavors! Can't afford to eat for breakfast there everyday but would certainly love to go there for special occasions like birthday breakfast and so on..

I saw that they deliver breakfast and thought that it would be amazing based on the reviews. I was wrong. 1 hour after calling, I called again and the person who took my order told me the food left 20 minutes prior. Needless to say, everything was stone cold! The delivery guy outright lied to me and told me he left 10 minutes prior to arrival.

2.25$ for a 300ml bottle of orange juice, 3.50$ for a cold coffee, grapefruits in the fruits when I have a severe allergy to it... so, total 34,67$ for barely edible food and fruits I will need to throw out. Never ordering from them again.

1/2 star review.

Juste Miamm juste à revoir les photos j'en veux encore et encore!! Petit emplacement sur notre dame pas beaucoup de tables mais service personnalisé et courtois, nourriture à s'en lecher les doigts on regrette même de ne pas pouvoir terminer les portions généreuses. Excellent choix pour un brunch en famille ou amis ou encore pour une soirée ou ils servent un excellent menu et diffusent les matchs (hockey).
Une carte alléchante et des prix tout à fait raisonnables. Que dire de la serveuse Cassandra ... un amour ! Si on habitait dans le coin on viendrait tous les dimanches. {j'adore la déco aussi}

(This is a review for the breakfast menu)

I went there on a quiet Tuesday morning. I was surprised to see the restaurant's sign as I am familiar with another Ôzeu restaurant close to where I live (in Montreal East) and had no idea there were others in the city. I am usually pretty reticent when it comes to chains but was not disappointed with my experience here.

The decor: Super branché, almost too pretty to be a breakfast restaurant. Definitely a place to bring someone you're trying to impress; I would be impressed.

The food: It delivers. The menu is affordable and offers quite a wide selection of breakfast classics. The presentation is pretty. The potatoes are major key aka to die for. And they have 6$ mimosas. What else can a girl ask for?

The service: Probably the only reason why I'm giving this restaurant 4 stars instead of 5. The waitress assigned to us was very sweet but when it came to give us the bill, it took her about 15 minutes although we had asked for it twice and were clearly in a hurry. There were only 2 people working in the restaurant and it seemed a bit difficult for them to deal with both the takeout orders and the few occupied tables. Maybe add an extra staff on week mornings?

Pour avoir déjà essayé le Ôzeu, ceci fut ma première visite au O'beuf! Pour regarder une game de hockey, ce restaurant est probablement une des meilleures places!!! Plein de promotion sur la bouffe comme le menu à 50% pendant le 5à7, 5 bières bouteille pour 25$ et les ailes de poulet à 50 cents pendant les matchs! J'ai pu essayé leur burger classic pour 8$ ce qui est moins dispendieux qu'un trio chez Mcdo.....et 100 fois mieux! La viande est AAA et jamais congelé! Très dure à battre! Il n'y a pas 10 000 écrans comme à la Station des sports, mais le projecteur fait très bien la job!!! 

Bref, peut-être pas l'endroit pour un souper en tête à tête, mais très bien pour une bouffe entre amis!!!!!

J'allais souvent au Petit cochon santé, j'aimais beaucoup la place; c'était parfait pour des dîners d'affaires pas trop compliqués. J'ai donc décidé d'aller Ôzeu & O'Boeuf (déjà le nom...) pour un dîner avec un partenaire d'affaire ce midi. C'était ok...Déjà un menu déjeuner au lunch c'est pas mon fort mais bon ils offrent aussi quelques options lunch. J'ai donc pris la table d'hôte du midi à 13$. Ça consistait en : une soupe lentille et bacon (correcte) + un quesadilla au poulet (bon!) servi avec frites (bonnes!) et salade (mélange printanier et tomates cerises pas frais = mou) + un choix de dessert, que je n'ai pas pris (crêpe ou gaufre).  Évidemment pour ce prix là c'est décent. Le service aussi était ok.  Je vais sûrement y retourner car pour dîner dans le coin on a pas beaucoup de choix, si on veut dîner assis surtout...Sinon je passerais probablement mon tour.

Pour une premier fois peux être pas la dernier mes ses mieux de change 

Nous somme aller 3 personnes pour dîner pour le burgerweek sur leur site ses de 7h a 15h. Et 17h à 22h    Nous somme arriver vers 12h il nous à donner une place et les menu de déjeuner !  Je suis aller voir le serveur et demande un menu du dîner mes ses juste pour le soir à 17h le site web et écrit Ca en tout qu'à je suis aller me rassoir à ma place 20 minutes plus tard on est partie pas de service verres d'eau cafe rien 
Les serveurs regarde à notre table mes retourne en arrière

I bought the groupon coupon for dinner for 4 and went there on a Friday night. The restaurant was super quiet for a Friday night, but after we ordered, we were all amazed with the quality of food. We ordered different burgers, each absolutely juicy and tasty. The cocktails were okay, but the food was amazing. Huge portion and good quality. I will definitely go back.
